pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.controller.UserController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/user")
 @PropertySource(value="classpath:systemMessages.properties") @PropertySource(value="classpath:library-configuration.properties")
public class UserController
extends Object
    The controller class is used to return the view depending on the user request. This controller contains the views of:
    • "login-page"
    • "main-page"
    • "create-user-form"
    • "confirm-page"
    • "user-update"
    • "change-password-form"
    • "admin-panel"
    • "user-management"
    • "user-details"
    • "user-details-management"
    • "users-books"


    This controller also perform the actions on the users.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserController(UserService userService, PdfService pdfService, org.springframework.core.env.Environment env, AccessLevelControl accessLevelControl, ReservationService reservationService, BookService bookService, PasswordValidator passwordValidator, SearchEngineUtils searchEngineUtils)
      Constructs a UserController with the UserService, PdfService, Environment, AccessLevelControl, ReservationService, BookService, PasswordValidator and SearchEngineUtils.

        The String representing the name of the view
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - A FileNotFoundException is thrown when the file can not be found.

      • showUserManagementModule

        @RequestMapping(value="/user-management")
public String showUserManagementModule(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                  org.springframework.ui.Model theModel,
                                                                                  @RequestParam(required=false,name="userManagementUserId")
                                                                                  String userManagementUserId,
                                                                                  @RequestParam(required=false,name="userManagementFirstName")
                                                                                  String userManagementFirstName,
                                                                                  @RequestParam(required=false,name="userManagementLastName")
                                                                                  String userManagementLastName,
                                                                                  @RequestParam(required=false,name="userManagementEmail")
                                                                                  String userManagementEmail,
                                                                                  @RequestParam(required=false,name="userManagementPesel")
                                                                                  String userManagementPesel,
                                                                                  @RequestParam(required=false,name="userManagementStartResult")
                                                                                  Integer userManagementStartResult)
        Returns the view of "user-management" with model attributes:
        • userManagementStartResult - The value of first index of the results
        • amountOfResults - The number of total results
        • showMoreLinkValue - The value of "showMoreLink"
        • resultRange - The description of pagination
        • showLessLinkValue - The value of "showLessLink"
        • usersList - The list of the User objects
        Parameters:
        request - The HttpServletRequest containing the HttpSession
        theModel - The Model containing the data passed to the view
        userManagementUserId - The String containing the id of the user
        userManagementFirstName - The String containing the first name of the user
        userManagementLastName - The String containing the last name of the user
        userManagementEmail - The String containing the email of the user
        userManagementPesel - The String containing the PESEL of the user
        userManagementStartResult - The Integer containing the first index of the results
        Returns:
        The String representing the name of the view
